docs.title: Welcome to My Docs Site
docs.text: We are excited to share our knowledge base and resources with you!

docs.title: Introducing TaskHero — Your Automation Assistant
docs.text: Welcome to the documentation for our new automation tool!

docs.title: What this tool does
docs.text:
• Automates repetitive tasks
  • Saves time and effort
  • Increases productivity

docs.title: How it works
docs.text:
This tool runs in the background and integrates with TaskHero.

Stay focused while the tool handles the rest!
